ygData.subject: Re: new player in the game
ygData.msgSnippet: Kyle, you should be careful how you phrase stuff. There is a Nightshade already, but Johnathan left the RPG, aka He s gone. So the name Nightshade, or Night

Kyle, you should be careful how you phrase stuff. There is a 
Nightshade already, but Johnathan left the RPG, aka He's gone. So 
the name Nightshade, or Night Shade, are both equally acceptable.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> You'll have to pick another name, there was already a Nightshade.  
> She used to be Arcee.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "lady_night_shade04" <lady_night_shade04@y...> 
> wrote:
> > The pod sliently broke through the atmosphere. After a few 
minutes, 
> > the pod slamed into the earth. The probe scaned the area for a 
> > lifeform and chose. Moments passes till the pod door opened and 
a  
> > matllack black tiger stepped out into the open. "Night shade, 
> > terrorise." She transformed quickly and smirked. A new pred was 
born
